### Description of the Solicitation

####  Solicitation Reference

*   **Solicitation Reference**: PW- QU2023-120-29138
*   **Solicitation Number**: F7013-230002/A
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Language of Documentation**: English and French

####  Tender Requirements

*   **Title**: Entertainment Distribution System
*   **Duration**: Not specified
*   **Delivery Date**: Above-mentioned
*   **Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement**: No
*   **Nature of Requirements**: Trade Agreement: CFTA, Tendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid, Competitive Procurement Strategy: Lowest/Lower Bid

####  Contact Information

*   **Contact Name**: Johnston, Charlene
*   **Contact Title**: None
*   **Contact Email**: [charlene.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:charlene.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Contact Phone**: 873-469-3859 (toll-free)
*   **Contact Fax**: None
*   **Contact Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, 8C2, Gatineau QC K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **Country**: Canada

####  Tender Submission Details

*   **Tender Closing Date**: September 13, 2023, 14:00 Eastern Time
